comments.raw_text: nsMediaDocument::StartLayout, nsXULDocument::StartLayout,  nsContentSink::StartLayout, and nsDocShell::CreateAboutBlankContentViewer all have very similar code.  We should just refactor that into a method on the presshell.  It needs to be virtual for docshell, so this is post-2.0.
